credibility_score.description: A score representing the credibility of the article based on the publisher and the source.

short_synopsis.description: A brief synopsis or summary of the article’s key points and takeaways.

sentiment_score.description: The sentiment tone of the article's content.

keywords.description: Key topics or keywords covered in the article.

article_impact_score.description: A score indicating how impactful or relevant the article is to the client’s business or strategy (1-5 scale).

content_type.description: The specific type of content the article represents.

geographic_relevance.description: The geographic relevance of the article (e.g., local to Australia, regional to Asia, or global).

related_links.description: Links to other related articles or resources that complement this article.

mentions_count.description: Number of times the article has been mentioned on social media.

platforms.description: List of social media platforms where the article has been mentioned.

social_media_mentions.description: Information about social media engagement with the article.
